content: finished measurements 45 x 45 cm / 17 75 x 17 75 materials garnstudio karisma superwash 250 gr nr 01 natural and use garnstudio vivaldi 100 gr nr 06 natural drops 7 mm / us k crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge gauge 3 double_crochet-group in width and 6 row in height with 1 strand of each yarn 2 strands = approx 10 x 10 cm / \ 4 x 4 **pattern links** swedish version 1 1 http //garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=87&d_id=20&lang=se
